dict.acceptation: 第一，最初；头等；一号，；[乐]高音部；
最早，最初；首次；宁愿；优先；
第一流的；最初的，最早的；基本的，概要的；高音的；

sent.orig: First comers will be served first.
In the first week the moon is in its first quarter, in the third week it is in its last quarter.
sent.trans: 第一个星期月亮处于上弦月的状态，第三个星期月亮处于下弦月的状态。

sent.orig: The rule in the restaurant is first come, first served.
sent.trans: 餐馆的规矩是先到先招待。

sent.orig: "Oh,thank you!" she enthused gratefully."You're a real gem,a diamond of the first water.”
sent.trans: “谢谢！”她表示感激热情洋溢地说，“你真是一个被人尊敬的人，第一流的好人。”

sent.orig: "The Capital Gazatte", first published in the Han Dynasty (206 B. C.-220 A. D.), was the earliest newspaper in the world.
sent.trans: 创始于中国汉代的《邸报》是世界上最早的报纸。
